sentences.en: " Damn his treacherous hide, I wish -- "
sentences.cn: “ 这个老不死的, 我真想 —— ”

sentences.en: A storm has made roads treacherous and knocked out power.
sentences.cn: 一场暴风雨致使公路隐患重重且电力瘫痪。

sentences.en: a treacherous plot to overthrow the leader
sentences.cn: 一个推翻领导人的阴谋

sentences.en: Can you think I would be so heartlessly treacherous?
sentences.cn: 难道你认为我会那样残酷地背信弃义?

sentences.en: Don't fall into the treacherous plot.
He was weak, cowardly and treacherous.
He was, perhaps, but at treacherous play with her.
sentences.cn: 也许他现在是不怀好意地拿她开心.

sentences.en: I hear that the old man has broken with that treacherous son of his.
sentences.cn: 听说老汉已跟他那个逆子断绝了关系.

sentences.en: She was swept away by the treacherous currents.
sentences.cn: 她给凶险的激流卷走了.

sentences.en: The current of the river is fast flowing and treacherous.
sentences.cn: 这条河水流湍急，变幻莫测。

sentences.en: The frozen snow was treacherous to walk on.
sentences.cn: 在冻雪上行走有潜在危险.

sentences.en: The oil made the ground slippery and treacherous to walk on.
sentences.cn: 油使地面发滑,走在上面很危险.

sentences.en: The President spoke of the treacherous intentions of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 总统谈及了敌人的奸诈用心。

sentences.en: The road becomes treacherous when it is iced up.
sentences.cn: 道路结冰以后就很危险了.

sentences.en: The surface water made the road treacherous for drivers.
sentences.cn: 路面的积水对驾车者构成危险.

sentences.en: With him at the helm, we are a hundred percent safe crossing these treacherous rapids.
sentences.cn: 由他掌舵, 通过这段激流险滩是万无一失的.

words.tran_cn: 背叛地；危险地；靠不住地

trans.tran_cn: 骗人的，不忠的，奸诈的，不可信的，有潜在危险的
trans.tran_en: someone who is treacherous cannot be trusted because they are not loyal and secretly intend to harm you
